SELECT a.id,a.questionnum,a.questioncotent,b.collegename,c.majorname,e.gradename,d.coursename,f.questiontypename
from tb_question a LEFT JOIN tb_college b ON a.collegenum = b.collegenum LEFT JOIN tb_major c on a.majornum = c.majornum LEFT JOIN tb_grade e on a.gradenum = e.gradenum LEFT JOIN tb_course d on a.coursenum = d.coursenum LEFT JOIN tb_questiontype f on a.questiontype = f.questiontype
WHERE a.questionnum like CONCAT('%', #{questionnum}, '%')
ORDER by a.id
